div.div: From Wikimedia Commons, the free media repository

td.div: Tiếng Việt: Quốc kỳ của Việt Nam Cộng hòa
Alemannisch: Flagge vo de Schdaat Vietnam und de Republik Vietnam
Deutsch: Flagge Französischen Tonkins (1890–1920) und Südvietnams
English: Flag of French Tonkin from 1890–1920 and of South Vietnam
Français : Drapeau du Tonkin Français (1890–1920), de l'État du Viêt Nam et de la République du Viêt Nam
日本語: 越南国と越南共和国の国旗
한국어: 越南國와 越南 共和國의 國旗 / 베트남남국와 베트남 공화국의 국기
Nederlands: Flag van Frans Tonkin van 1890 tot 1920 en van Zuid-Vietnam

div.div: Bân-lâm-gú: Oa̍t-lâm Kok hô Oa̍t-lâm Kiōng-hô-kok ê kok-kî-á

td.div: 中文（简体）: 越南国和越南共和国国旗
中文（繁體）: 越南國和越南共和國國旗

td.p: For North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) purposes between 1955 and 1976 please use the Image:Flag of North Vietnam.svg.
td.div: See also: en:Flag of South Vietnam.
See also categories: SVG flags of South Vietnam and Coats of arms of South Vietnam.

span.span: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This flag was created with a text editor.
Please do not replace the simplified code by another version created with Inkscape or a similar vector graphics editor!

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.div:
This work is in the public domain in Vietnam for one of the following reasons:
It is a cinematographic work, photographic work, work of applied art or anonymous work first published more than 75 years ago. (See Commons:Copyright_rules_by_territory/Vietnam)
It is a cinematographic work, photographic work, dramatic work, work of applied art or anonymous work first published more than 50 years prior to January 1, 2010.
It is another type of work, and the creator died more than 50 years ago.
To uploader: Please provide where the image was first published and who created it.

p.span: English | Deutsch | français | Bahasa Melayu | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | Español | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This image of simple geometry is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain, because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

tr.td:
I, the copyright holder of this work, release this work into the public domain. This applies worldwide.
In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
I grant anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td:
Legal disclaimer
This image is or contains a symbol or symbols prohibited by Vietnam's National Assembly, due to (variously) representations of South Vietnam, or similar governmental structures; or of organizations associated with said.
Imagery covered may include the Flag of South Vietnam and emblems/insignias.

div.p: Derivative works of this file: Flag map of Vietnam (democratic).svg

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current17:53, 15 September 2020900 × 600 (200 bytes)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Fixed red-yellow stripes according to official construction sheet (File:Flag of South Vietnam (construction).svg): the height of each strip (red-yellow) must be 1/15 of the height of the flag; the height of the group of 5 stripes (3 red and 2 yellow) must be 1/3 of the flag height. See also the design of related emblem: File:Emblem of South Vietnam (1963-1975).svg. Optimized svg code with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.
07:21, 21 October 2015900 × 600 (224 bytes)Sarang (talk | contribs)simplified
19:17, 16 September 2013900 × 600 (545 bytes)Fry1989 (talk | contribs)This is your last chance before a block request
06:59, 5 March 2013900 × 600 (545 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 06:49, 5 March 2013
19:58, 17 May 2012900 × 600 (545 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)As per my talk page.
17:28, 17 May 2012900 × 600 (548 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Code
17:17, 17 May 2012900 × 600 (598 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 07:26, 17 February 2012 (you list 2 colors in the code for each element; pick one)
10:57, 17 May 2012900 × 600 (2 KB)Antemister (talk | contribs)adjust colors
07:26, 17 February 2012900 × 600 (598 bytes)Wright.one (talk | contribs)fixed validation warning
18:18, 12 June 2011900 × 600 (440 bytes)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 01:49, 14 April 2011 (issues)
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
